page.title: 06A day in the life of cont.
page.content: At 3.30 pm.school finishes and we line up in the playground and wait for our bus to arrive.At 3.40 pm.approx.we get on our bus and leave for home.When I get home I get changed and wash.Between 4.30 pm. and 6.00 pm. I do my homework.During some of the evening I go down to "West Royal Stores" owned by the Atkins family;there I meet some of my friends who congregate outside.Around 7.00 pm.I have my tea with the family which consists of mum,dad and noisy younger sister.During the rest of the evening I watch television,play my "Duran Duran" tapes or go out on my bike visiting friends around Kempsey. At 9.30 pm. I clean my teeth and go to bed.
